channel.title: [PI]Doors
channel.description:
Okay so doors have all of a sudden smacked me in the face. Yes, i know you fix them in doors.cfg. BUT, how do you get them the right way? I seem to be having great dificulty with this.. They always end up like this:
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/ykqbm.jpg[/img]
Thanks

item.title: [PI]Doors
item.dc:creator: @party_boiz123 party boiz123
item.description:
@party_boiz123 wrote:

ROmgitsshane, are you suggesting that I delete the doors? If so thats not exactly what im aiming for, im hoping to make them actually work and return to their regular state.
Loveandpower, do you remember death tacoz?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Doors
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“OmgItsShane, post:3, topic:400949”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=498005.msg3641887#msg3641887 date=1309060680]
I don’t think the doors.cfg works… Lol
[/quote]
It does. You gotta do it a certain way though its tricky, Try to remove it by doing the -1 method in ObjectManager. If that doesn’t work tell us.[/quote]And who told you about this ? hmm? ~^ <3

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Doors
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

runewings317:

I don’t think the doors.cfg works… Lol

It does. You gotta do it a certain way though its tricky, Try to remove it by doing the -1 method in ObjectManager. If that doesn’t work tell us.

Read full topic
